title: Twitter is rolling out Community creation and testing 1080p video uploads
content:
Twitter started as a very basic social media platform for sharing ideas and news through no more than 140 characters. The service started to evolve slowly, bringing new features and increasing the character limit in the process. Lately, the company has been introducing plenty of new changes — some of which are exclusive to Twitter

The post Twitter is rolling out Community creation and testing 1080p video uploads appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Twitter is rolling out Community creation and testing 1080p video uploads. The latter feature is exclusive to Blue subscribers for now.
